column4: Hi people. Question: who has a good tip about setting up a multimedia system in my house which I can use to play music in different rooms, play movies on my tv, etc?
any websites or (Ubuntu based) distro that comes to mind?
It isnt in the repos yet but the XBMC for linux is getting pretty mature
Or you could use mythubuntu, but I've always found the myth front-end to be painfully slow
